title: Purchased RP but haven't received it
body: Yesterday I tried purchasing RP but it didn't work I did pay €35 it did get taken from my bank but I didn't receive any RP I got a pop up after the purchase that there was a error and that I would get the rp withing 24 hours, it's a day later and I still havent received the RP could any rioter help me?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'd give it a little bit longer, if you still haven't received the RP within another days time then I would recommend you to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) as we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific issues.
